title: Which leads to decreased inflationary expectations

content.question: Assuming a banking system with limited reserves, which of the following will most likely lead to a decrease in inflationary expectations?

choices.label: A decrease in the marginal propensity to save
A decrease in the money supply
An increase in the government budget deficit
An increase in the prices of raw materials

content.answer: A decrease in the money supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
